email.title: Weekly Digest

image.alt: A biscuit sinking in a cup of milk
image.title: Tango Down.

email.text:
Hi everyone!
In this week's digest you can find out about upcoming events from Facebook and ShowCode, as well as the upcoming Tech Asian Network.
email.heading: Expand your network and build connections with other Asians in Tech!
email.text:
TAN (Tech Asian Network) aims to create an inclusive environment for Asians who are passionate about Technology. Join them on the 8th of June for their first ever event! They will be hosting a virtual networking event to allow people to expand their network and connect with other Asians in Tech.
https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/virtual-networking-event-tickets-155528900127
email.heading: Facebook Wayfinder, Black@ and Women@ Events
email.sponsor:
## Facebook Wayfinder
Are you curious about what lies ahead and what the best route for your career may be? Join us at our inaugural Virtual Wayfinder event to learn more about our teams, the different directions your studies could take you, and gain great tips on how to "wayfind" your path towards business and engineering careers in the tech industry.
If youâ€™d like to find out more about the event and sign-up, please follow this link:
https://fbwayfinder-2021.splashthat.com/
email.text:
## Facebook Black@ hosts Mentored Coding Challenges
The Black@ communityâ€™s mission: is to build a strong vibrant community that leads the conversation on equity, accelerating the personal and professional development of its members, and beyond.
In this spirit, we are excited to host an event to give you more exposure to our interview process, help walk you through coding challenges and learn more about the Black@ community here at Facebook.
If you are interested in attending, please apply by following the link and uploading your CV below before the 27th of May.
https://blackhostsmentoredcodingchallengeslondon2021.splashthat.com/

## EMEA Women@ EMEA Hack 2021:
Join us for our first Women@ EMEA Hack, gain insight into our company culture, products, and career opportunities while solving coding challenges and learning from our engineers! The winning teams of the Hack will receive prizes.
Please apply via this link:
https://applicationwomenhack2021.splashthat.com/
email.heading: Level-Up Society Hackathon
email.sponsor:
### A 48-hour hackathon, giving you the chance to help level-up society through gamification.
## Registrations for our global online hackathon are now open ğŸŒ
You can register for the hack now, either as a team or as an individual! If you don't have a team don't worry, you can find one on our [Discord Server](https://discord.gg/fUJBrWvxhg) ğŸ‘¾
## ğŸ¤” Why join our hackathon?
* Compete for the chance to win our Â£5,000 main prize, as well as our sub-category prizes ğŸ¤‘
* We'll have some awesome workshops in the build-up to the hack, and experienced mentors over the weekend to help guide you through ğŸ’¡
* Either compete in a team with your friends, or join a team and make new ones! We're a bit biased, but a hack is a great way to engage with people ğŸ˜
## ğŸ’» When and where
* â° The hack will get underway on Friday July 16th at 18:00 BST with our intro session on YouTube live. We'll give you the full brief, judging criteria and everything you need to start the 48-hour hack!
* ğŸ‘¾ As it's online, we'll run the event through our Discord Server with mentorship and breakout sessions available throughout the weekend. You'll receive updates via email and the link to [join our Discord](https://discord.gg/fUJBrWvxhg) once you've registered, so check your junk if you don't have anything!
## ğŸš€ What you'll have to do
All will be revealed in our intro session ğŸ‘€ğŸ‘€ we don't want anyone getting a headstart so we're keeping our lips sealed. All you need to do is sign-up, and start thinking about an idea that could help Level-Up Society.
### You can find more information and register at [Eventbrite](https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/level-up-society-hackathon-tickets-153784402287?aff=Imperial)
